```{r 1, include=FALSE}
install.packages("sf")
```

```{r 2, include=FALSE}
library(sf)
library(ggplot2)

# Assuming your map_plot data frame has columns 'Longitude', 'Latitude', and 'RockType'
my_map <- st_as_sf(map_plot, coords = c('Longitude', 'Latitude'))

# Plot it, coloring by RockType
my_map <- ggplot(data = my_map) + 
  geom_sf(aes(color = Measurement_Surface)) + 
  theme_minimal() +
  labs(x = "Longitude (degrees W)", y = "Latitude (degrees N)", color = "Rock Type") +
  scale_color_manual(values = c("joint plane" = "red", "contact" = "blue", "bedding plane" = "green", "flow top" = "pink", "flow banding" = "orange", "flow foliation" = "black")) # Customize colors as needed

my_map
```
